headline: 1Kosmos Ranked Highest for Workforce Use Cases in 2025 Gartner® Critical Capabilities for Identity Verification Report
summary: ISELIN, N.J., September 11, 2025--1Kosmos delivers a multi-modal, continuous, and adaptive workforce identity verification platform that adjusts to business risk and context.

headline: CHROs should take a more active role in digital security, Gartner advises
summary: “Many CHROs do not have strong digital awareness and are struggling to lead and influence AI and digital transformation,” a Gartner analyst said.
